name: Bio cover
uniques: Tile provides yield without assigned population
Can be built outside your borders
Provides [1] [Bio matter] <if [Bio cover usage] is constructed>
Provides [1] [Bio matter] <if [Economical bio cover usage] is constructed>
Provides [2] [Bio matter] <if [Advanced economical bio cover usage] is constructed>

name: Experimental bio cover
uniques: Tile provides yield without assigned population
Can be built outside your borders
Provides [1] [BTA science] <if [Bio cover usage] is constructed>
Provides [1] [Bio matter] <if [Economical bio cover usage] is constructed>
Provides [1] [BTA science] <if [Advanced economical bio cover usage] is constructed>

name: Bio cover expansion node
uniques: Tile provides yield without assigned population
Can be built outside your borders
Constructing it will take over the tiles around it and assign them to your closest city
Unavailable <in tiles adjacent to [{non-[Enemy Land]} {Foreign Land}]>
Provides [1] [Bio matter] <if [Bio cover usage] is constructed>
Provides [1] [Bio matter] <if [Economical bio cover usage] is constructed>
Provides [2] [Bio matter] <if [Advanced Economical bio cover usage] is constructed>

name: Bio fortress
uniques: Tile provides yield without assigned population
Can be built outside your borders
+50% strength for own units on this tile when defending
+50% strength for own units on this tile when defending <if [Advanced military bio cover usage] is constructed>

name: Bio cannons
uniques: Tile provides yield without assigned population
Can be built outside your borders
+50% strength for own units on this tile when attacking
+50% strength for own units on this tile when attacking <if [Advanced military bio cover usage] is constructed>

name: Acid spores generator
uniques: Tile provides yield without assigned population
Can be built outside your borders
Adjacent enemy units ending their turn take [5] damage <if [Bio cover usage] is constructed>
Adjacent enemy units ending their turn take [5] damage <if [Advanced military bio cover usage] is constructed>
